mapper.select: SELECT iu.id unitId, iu.name unitName, iu.tax_id unitTaxId, iu.address unitAddress, iu.tel unitTel, iu.account unitAccount, i.id invoiceId, i.invoice_code invoiceCode, i.invoice_number invoiceNumber, i.date invoiceDate, i.is_sell invoiceType, g.id goodsId, g.name goodsName, g.specification goodsSpecification, g.unit goodsUnit, ig.number goodsNumber, g.unite_price goodsUnitPrice, (ig.number*g.unite_price) goodsMoney, g.tax_rate goodsTaxRate, (ig.number*g.unite_price*g.tax_rate) goodsTaxMoney FROM invoice i LEFT JOIN invoice_unit iu on i.unit_id = iu.id LEFT JOIN invoice__goods ig on i.id = ig.invoice_id LEFT JOIN product_goods g on g.id = ig.goods_id WHERE i.id = #{invoiceId}
